Label: CT 109: Step-down Interest Rate Swap of USD 1000.0 Notiona
Description: Step-down Interest Rate Swap of USD 1000.0 Notional, starting at 01/02/15 with Maturity after 2 years. The fixed leg is based on semi-annual payments of a Coupon starting at 5% and decreasing by 1% every new Coupon. The floating leg is based on semi-annual payments linked to a reference rate + 2%.
